title: raritycheck
author: raritycheck
created_time: May 31, 2022, 10:23:20 PMLast edit: October 03, 2022, 02:39:00 AM by raritycheck
content: HelloUpdate on RC coins 2022From our side we have the stickers ready. We are waiting on coins. Some delay due from the mint.-> Latest email from the mint received today.Coins were finished on Friday. Customs documents have been applied for and we are waiting for them to be approved – sorry, nothing we can do to speed up the process (just waiting on export documents). Then we will share a tracking with you and ship asap.Once we have the coins, we will update the forum and send tracking to all the pre-sale buyers. And also, create a post with remaining coins available for purchase.Thanks,Team RC

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Looking forward to these releases, appreciate the update!

comments.author: Bullion-n-BTC
comments.body: Looking forward to getting mine. I stack silver coins/bars and for a long time I hated enameled art bars as I thought they were ugly and was something of a silver coin “purist”. Once I bought my first enameled art bar and saw how beautiful enamel on silver is I was hooked. Now some of the rarest, most valuable pieces in my collection are enameled silver bars and rounds. Can’t wait to get these! We need more enameled bitcoin pieces moving forward! I even had an idea of making a silver bitcoin wallet, applying the private key and sticker, and the. Enameling over the entire coin sealing the key in. To access funds you’d have to basically destroy the coin making it much easier to HODL. Looking forward to getting these keep up the great work!

comments.author: Suzuki Matt
comments.body: Great. I can't wait to see them. I'm very curious to see how they come out. Thanks for the update.

comments.author: Otillio1330
comments.body: Awesome! I can’t wait to see these. Really loved this design, and that orange enamel was a great touch.

comments.author: raritycheck
comments.body: Update: Finally, all coins arrived in perfect condition.Front of the coin is exactly as awesome and beautiful as designed on paper. One of the most beautiful we have seen.Each coin is just something else. But mint has made a mistake in the reverse of the coin. (Pre-sale buyers can contact us and we will give details about the mistake.)Good thing is that mint recognises their mistake. We are working with the mint to figure out how to get this fixed. But for now they are saying that it would take them 4-6 weeks to resend fixed coins (they are arranging FedEx pick up to collect delivered coins).We are so sorry for this inconvenience. They will send us with more details on Monday. Our rough estimate puts coins to be delivered by August 1st week. So two months of delay from original May end week. We will try to make up for this delay. We are thinking of some ideas. Please bear with us.

comments.author: tweetious
comments.body: The coins look good! Personally speaking, I do not like the borders around/inside the text on the front side of the coin (makes a lil bit moar difficult to read the text). Although I would prefer without (similar to the back side of the coins), I can clearly understand that this might be a designing/implementation restriction, due to the background image.

comments.author: Bitbuddy60
comments.body: Quote from: tweetious on June 11, 2022, 11:28:33 AMThe coins look good! Personally speaking, I do not like the borders around/inside the text on the front side of the coin (makes a lil bit moar difficult to read the text). Although I would prefer without (similar to the back side of the coins), I can clearly understand that this might be a designing/implementation restriction, due to the background image.Thank you for the update.

comments.author: Bullion-n-BTC
comments.body: Any update on these? I work offshore so I miss a lot of updates and fall out of the loop sometimes

comments.author: YodasRedRocket
comments.body: RarityCheck...The last message I received from you, you said shipment was delayed until 1st week of August....Can you provide an update for members who paid many months ago?Thanks!Yoda

comments.author: Bitbuddy60
comments.body: Quote from: YodasRedRocket on August 04, 2022, 04:15:59 PMRarityCheck...The last message I received from you, you said shipment was delayed until 1st week of August....Can you provide an update for members who paid many months ago?Thanks!YodaI agree with mine going to Escrow.

comments.author: raritycheck
comments.body: Yes! Mint is sending us two samples this time They send following email yesterday (we have not received the sample 'physically' yet! But samples look correct in pictures.)We will post pictures of sample as soon as we get them.They are bit slow tbh! Once we approve the samples. They should be able to ship everything in two weeks.We will keep updating this topic.

comments.author: raritycheck
comments.body: Quote from: Bitbuddy60 on August 04, 2022, 05:28:57 PMQuote from: YodasRedRocket on August 04, 2022, 04:15:59 PMRarityCheck...The last message I received from you, you said shipment was delayed until 1st week of August....Can you provide an update for members who paid many months ago?Thanks!YodaI agree with mine going to Escrow.We are more than happy to use escrow Thank you for waiting!

comments.author: Suzuki Matt
comments.body: So just to be clear you are still waiting on the samples to approve for production? Is that correct?

comments.author: raritycheck
comments.body: Quote from: Suzuki Matt on August 04, 2022, 07:21:05 PMSo just to be clear you are still waiting on the samples to approve for production? Is that correct? The "die" is ready. They just want to make sure coins have the correct dimension this time. We have the holos ready as well. We also didn't want to take any risk so this is better.

comments.author: raritycheck
comments.body: Yes!  We approved the design.They send following reply email on Wed   We have replied that please try to finish production soonerFingers crossed!

comments.author: Bullion-n-BTC
comments.body: So if I’m reading correctly should be another month to a month and a half until coins are finished? I’m guessing around 2 months to reach us buyers if all goes according to plan?
